Common.name: Name

Metadata.title: visicheck.ai – AI Visibility Tracking
Metadata.description: Track the visibility of your domains and brands in ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini and Perplexity.

Landing.heroTitle: Make visibility in AI search systems measurable.
Landing.heroSubtitle: visicheck.ai shows how brands appear in ChatGPT & Co – and how to systematically improve that visibility.
Landing.problemTitle: Your brand already lives in AI answers – you just can't see it.
Landing.problemPoint1Desc: More and more users rely on AI recommendations instead of traditional search results.
Landing.problemPoint2Desc: Every answer is unique – manual checking doesn't scale.
Landing.problemPoint3Desc: SEO tools measure Google rankings. Who measures visibility in ChatGPT?
Landing.usp1Desc: See how often and where your brand appears in AI responses.
Landing.usp2Desc: Not just mentions – but ranking and tone.
Landing.usp3Desc: ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude & more in one dashboard.
Landing.usp4Desc: Define prompts – visicheck.ai measures automatically every day.
Landing.usp5Desc: Discover why others are visible – and you're not.
Landing.techMessage1: visicheck.ai is not a marketing gimmick.
Landing.techMessage2: visicheck.ai is analytics infrastructure for the AI era.
Landing.startTitle: Setup in minutes. First insights within minutes.
Landing.startStep1Desc: Define the questions you want AI models to answer.
Landing.startStep2Desc: Choose the brands you want to benchmark against.
Landing.startStep3Desc: Get your first visibility insights the next day.
Landing.whyPoint1: Built for AI search, not legacy SEO
Landing.whyPoint2: Built for growth teams, not vanity metrics
Landing.finalCtaDesc: Start now and see how your brand performs in AI responses.
Landing.footerTagline: AI search visibility platform for data-driven teams.

SignUp.feature2: Automated daily, weekly or monthly checks
SignUp.feature4: Start for free – no credit card required
